description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Saint-Étienne vs PSG in the Ligue 1
title: Saint-Étienne vs PSG: Ligue 1 stats & head-to-head
title_page: Saint-Étienne vs PSG: Ligue 1 stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport
maintext:
Post
Attempt blocked. Louis Mouton (Saint-Etienne) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Léo Pétrot with a headed pass.
Post
Fourth official has announced 3 minutes of added time.
Goal!
Goal! Saint-Etienne 1, Paris Saint Germain 6. Ibrahim Mbaye (Paris Saint Germain) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Bradley Barcola.
Post
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Post
Attempt blocked. Pierre Ekwah (Saint-Etienne) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Ben Old.
